title: Making a Toggle Switch into a New HTML Element
summary: Let's build the toggle switch element as a web component using the humble light bulb to guide our thinking.
long_summary: The toggle switch is sure a common thing on websites. It'd be super nice if it were its own HTML element... Well, with web components, we can actually do this! Let's build a toggle switch element while at the same time... piece together a light bulb from scratch?!
